bibl.title: Philitas of Cos.
bibl.note: Preface. - Abbreviations and Bibliography. - Testimonia. - Alleged Testimonia. - Introduction. - Poetical Fragments (frr. 1-28). - Grammatical fragments (frr. 29-56). - Appendices. - Indices. - Concordances. - Includes the papyrological testimonia and fragments.
bibl.seg: SPANOUDAKIS Konstantinos, Philitas of Cos. (Mnemosyne. Supplementum 229.)
Leiden, E.J. Brill, 2002, 8°, xxviii-454 pp. ISBN 90-04-12428-4. €118.

Preface. - Abbreviations and Bibliography. - Testimonia. - Alleged Testimonia. - Introduction. - Poetical Fragments (frr. 1-28). - Grammatical fragments (frr. 29-56). - Appendices. - Indices. - Concordances. - Includes the papyrological testimonia and fragments.

C.R. par Tiziano Dorandi, Mnemosyne 4a s., 56 (2003) pp. 750-753. - N. Hopkinson, CR N.S., 53 (2003) pp. 311-312. - Gerson Schade, Gnomon 77 (2005) pp. 266-268. - H. White, Orpheus 23 (2002) pp. 292-294.
